languages.text: Второй отряд понес серьезные потери, когда на разведчиков обрушилась масса кабелей, находящихся под напряжением. Вести, бывший лидер группы, разжалованный Вольным Торговцем за легкомысленность, оказался в числе жертв. Люди отступили, не сумев ни вынести тела товарищей, ни найти сколь-либо ценной добычи.

The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.
languages.original_text: Второй отряд понес серьезные потери, когда на разведчиков обрушилась масса кабелей, находящихся под напряжением. Вести, бывший лидер группы, разжалованный Вольным Торговцем за легкомысленность, оказался в числе жертв. Люди отступили, не сумев ни вынести тела товарищей, ни найти сколь-либо ценной добычи.

traits.locale_text: The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

languages.text: La segunda unidad sufrió numerosas bajas cuando una gran maraña de cables electrizados les cayó encima. Vesti, el anterior líder del grupo a quien {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había despojado del cargo por frivolidad, fue uno de los caídos. El equipo se retiró sin poder recuperar los cadáveres de sus camaradas ni botín de ninguna clase de la nave.
languages.original_text: The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

traits.locale_text: La segunda unidad sufrió numerosas bajas cuando una gran maraña de cables electrizados les cayó encima. Vesti, el anterior líder del grupo a quien {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente había despojado del cargo por frivolidad, fue uno de los caídos. El equipo se retiró sin poder recuperar los cadáveres de sus camaradas ni botín de ninguna clase de la nave.

languages.text: 第二支小队遭受了惨重的损失，因为一大捆带电的电缆砸在了队员身上。这支小队的前任队长维斯提，由于作风浮躁而被行商浪人剥夺了职位，也同样在这场事故中不幸身亡。小队只得撤退，无法从飞船上获得任何有价值的资源，阵亡队员的遗体也被留在了飞船上。
languages.original_text: The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

traits.locale_text: 第二支小队遭受了惨重的损失，因为一大捆带电的电缆砸在了队员身上。这支小队的前任队长维斯提，由于作风浮躁而被行商浪人剥夺了职位，也同样在这场事故中不幸身亡。小队只得撤退，无法从飞船上获得任何有价值的资源，阵亡队员的遗体也被留在了飞船上。

languages.text: 2番目の部隊は大きな通電ケーブルの束がその上に落ちたため、重大な損害を被った。グループの元リーダーで、不真面目な行動で自由開拓者から地位を剥奪されたヴェスティも死亡者の中に含まれていた。チームは船から仲間の遺体や貴重な物資を回収することもできずに撤退した。
languages.original_text: The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

traits.locale_text: 2番目の部隊は大きな通電ケーブルの束がその上に落ちたため、重大な損害を被った。グループの元リーダーで、不真面目な行動で自由開拓者から地位を剥奪されたヴェスティも死亡者の中に含まれていた。チームは船から仲間の遺体や貴重な物資を回収することもできずに撤退した。

languages.text: Die zweite Einheit erlitt massive Verluste, als ein großes Bündel von Stromkabeln auf sie herabstürzte. Vesti, der vormalige Anführer der Gruppe, der {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} wegen Leichtfertigkeit seines Postens enthoben worden war, befand sich unter den Opfern. Das Team zog sich zurück und konnte weder die Leichen seiner Kameraden bergen noch irgendetwas von Wert aus dem Schiff sicherstellen.
languages.original_text: The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

traits.locale_text: Die zweite Einheit erlitt massive Verluste, als ein großes Bündel von Stromkabeln auf sie herabstürzte. Vesti, der vormalige Anführer der Gruppe, der {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} wegen Leichtfertigkeit seines Postens enthoben worden war, befand sich unter den Opfern. Das Team zog sich zurück und konnte weder die Leichen seiner Kameraden bergen noch irgendetwas von Wert aus dem Schiff sicherstellen.

languages.text: La deuxième unité avait subi de lourdes pertes lorsqu'un énorme faisceau de câbles électrifiés lui était tombé dessus. Vesti, l'ancien commandant du groupe que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avait relevé de ses fonctions en raison de son attitude cavalière, se trouvait parmi les victimes. Les autres avaient été contraints de battre en retraite sans pouvoir ramener les corps de leurs camarades ni mettre la main sur du matériel utile.
languages.original_text: The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

traits.locale_text: La deuxième unité avait subi de lourdes pertes lorsqu'un énorme faisceau de câbles électrifiés lui était tombé dessus. Vesti, l'ancien commandant du groupe que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avait relevé de ses fonctions en raison de son attitude cavalière, se trouvait parmi les victimes. Les autres avaient été contraints de battre en retraite sans pouvoir ramener les corps de leurs camarades ni mettre la main sur du matériel utile.

languages.text: İkinci birim, hasarlı kablolardan oluşan devasa bir yığın üstlerine düştüğünde çok sayıda kayıp vermişti. Laubaliliğinden ötürü Hür Tacir'in görevden aldığı grup lideri Vesti de şehitler arasındaydı. Takım geri çekilmiş ancak düşen yoldaşlarının naaşlarını geri alamamış ya da değerli hiçbir ganimet ele geçirmeyi başaramamıştı.
languages.original_text: The second unit suffered serious losses when a large bundle of electrified cables fell on top of them. Vesti, the group's former leader who had been stripped of his position by the Rogue Trader for flippancy, was among those who died. The team retreated, unable to retrieve the bodies of their comrades or any kind of valuable haul from the ship.

traits.locale_text: İkinci birim, hasarlı kablolardan oluşan devasa bir yığın üstlerine düştüğünde çok sayıda kayıp vermişti. Laubaliliğinden ötürü Hür Tacir tarafından pozisyonundan alınan grup lideri Vesti de şehitler arasındaydı. Takım geri çekilmiş ancak düşen yoldaşlarının naaşlarını geri alamamış ya da değerli herhangi bir ganimet ele geçirmeyi başaramamıştı.
